p: The healthy grown plant leaf, node and internodes were unruffled and wash carefully beneath running tap water, surface sterilization to produce contamination free plants were carried out under microbes free aseptic conditions. The explants were transferred to a beaker containing running tap water (10 min) without damage plant tissues, then explants washed with sodium hypochlorite (3%; 15 min) then explants were washed with HgCl 2 (0.2%) with dissimilar time duration, changing the solution at 5 min interval. The sterilized (surface) explants were washed through distilled (sterile) water for 3–5 times (5 min each). The explants were slashed into minute pieces (0.5–1.0 cm) slashed explants transfer to MS ( Murashige and Skoog, 1962) semi-solid medium under in vitro conditions in a laminar flow chamber ( Hariprasath et al., 2015).
